biocontainers.name: refgenie
biocontainers.summary: Refgenie creates a standardized folder structure for reference genome files and indexes. you can download pre-built genomes or build your own for any fasta file

biotools.summary: Refgenie manages storage, access, and transfer of reference genome resources. It provides command-line and Python interfaces to download pre-built reference genome "assets", like indexes used by bioinformatics tools. It can also build assets for custom genome assemblies. Refgenie provides programmatic access to a standard genome folder structure, so software can swap from one genome to another.
